text:
– Addition: x+y= (x1,...,x n)+( y1,...,y n) = (x1 +y1,...,x n+yn)
for all x,y∈Rn
– Multiplication by scalars: λx = λ(x1,...,x n) = ( λx1,...,λx n) for
all λ∈R,x∈Rn
V= Rm×n,m,n ∈N is a vector space with
– Addition: A+ B =


a11 + b11 ··· a1n + b1n
... ...
am1 + bm1 ··· amn + bmn

 is deﬁned ele-
mentwise for all A,B∈V
– Multiplication by scalars: λA =


λa11 ··· λa1n
... ...
λam1 ··· λamn

as deﬁned in
Section 2.2. Remember that Rm×n is equivalent to Rmn.
